website_summaries.verdict: This mattress is designed to accommodate a wide range of sleep styles.
pros: Features a memory foam layer and latex, making the mattress a great option for all types of sleepers
Includes a 2-tone cover to protect mattress
Boasts individually-wrapped steel coils that isolate motion and increase airflow
cons: Offers limited support in contrast to similar mattresses
Mattress tends to be very stiff

customer_reviews.title: Not built for longevity
customer_reviews.text: Initial thoughts were positive, the mattress did not have strong odor or off-gassing. After an initial break-in period, I felt that the mattress was a good balance of comfort and firmness. Unfortunately, after sleeping on this mattress for 6 months it no longer offers a good level of support. There is a significant sink along the center of the mattress and there is not enough firmness to get through a night of sleep without significant aches and pains. I am a relatively standard size, 6' and 175lbs and primarily a side-sleeper. Unfortunate that this mattress broke down quickly as the initial comfort was positive.
customer_reviews.author: JMinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a 5 star for the customer service I received on this purchase. We received this mattress very quickly opened it up it did have a little bit of a smell but after 2 days of letting it air out it was perfectly fine very soft material very well made very nice mattress however was much too hard for us. I thought it would have been a little softer I'm giving this 5 stars because I contacted Amazon to return it and they were great very very helpful and handled our issues perfectly Amazon rocks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph D.

customer_reviews.title: Great nights rest for less
customer_reviews.text: I spent many hours looking at hybrid beds and mattress reviews before deciding that spending hundreds more would probably yield a rather small return in value. So I did want coils rather than a slab of just foam and latex as a top layer for comfort and longevity. Also a low odor and non toxic fire retardant would be preferred as well. This bed hit pretty much all the check boxes. Bed is very comfortable, sleeps cool, good support, good edge support, minimal motion transfer and great price. If it holds up and lasts without sagging then I'll be completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Reknso

customer_reviews.title: Im in love! As any average smart consumer would do
customer_reviews.text: Im in love! As any average smart consumer would do, I spent gazillion hours trying to decide on a bed and I'm VERY happy! Granted, this is my first "hybrid" mattress Ive ever purchased, but my last mattress of 5 years was a pillow-top. Considering this purchase was during an Amazon sale, it definitely influenced my purchase. This baby is soft as hell and sleep hasn't felt any better! My old mattress would make my box crack & squeak more than a 80s Horror Movie & this mattress actually prevents it! For anyone whos trying to save a few bills & hesitant to try a latex hybrid mattress this one's pretty good! I do not regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Moses A Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Firm in all the right ways, zero motion transfer
customer_reviews.text: Everything it says it is! Firm but still cushioned, a cool sleep, zero motion transfer, edges are well supported which makes the bed feel even bigger, the 12 in is SO HEAVY lol I'm a small girl living alone and almost couldn't get it on my box spring but that's the only con I can imagine. I worry about it's lifespan/longevity as it is so cheap compared to other top brands but about a month in I am still quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I did enough research and reviewing but no. Evidently one persons firm mattress is to soft for another. This mattress is not firm at all. Not at all. According to Lucid this is the firmest they make. It's just garbage. My suggestion would be to stick with a company that makes real mattresses instead of big square pieces of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Grvntleg

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a bunch of beds. I layed on several trying to decide. Then I scanned reviews, finally deciding on Lucids hybrid. Wrapped coils, foam and latex. Yes it is firmer but yet soft. It does not have that feeling of "wrapping around you" when laying on it. However it has gotten softer and I'm sure it will soften even more. Only had it maybe 35 days. I like it. I also purchased Lucids adjustable frame. Great combo and great service by Lucid. With an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it was been 7 months since we purchased this bed. As you can see from the photo there are indents on each side. This mattress now looks and sleeps like the 20 year old conventional mattress we replaced with the Lucid. VERY disappointed. We followed all the set up instructions EXACTLY and the bed is on a regular King sized box springs and frame. Now I’ve got to try and get my money back. I guess the saying is true, “You get what you pay for.”
customer_reviews.author: ShellyB

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a concrete floor.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and took my time trying to pick out the perfect mattress. This mattress is so firm it feels like you're sleeping on a concrete floor. I actually had to get up a 3am and sleep on my couch. I'm very confused with all of the reviews on this item. It's so uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: nikole lee wingate

customer_reviews.title: I spent a lot of time researching for the best value. This bed came in on time
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching for the best value. This bed came in on time, expanded to height quickly, and felt pretty good for a few weeks. The mattress is now "wavy," with one corner higher than the other, a large hump on the edge on one side, and dipping in the middle of the mattress. It feels progressively worse each week. I would not recommend purchasing this. Update: I contacted Lucid. They addressed my issue within a few days. Kudos to Lucid for the rapid response.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Sheds fiberglass!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's sort of incredible that these things sell as well as they do given that so many of them have this issue - this thing sheds fiberglass all over. There are no holes in the fabric wrap, either. It's shedding straight through the wrap. I didn't have this problem with a mattress from another company last year, I guess I should've just gone with theirs. Going to try wrapping it in a storage plastic wrap to contain the shards that keep burying into me, but I'm guessing it'll develop mold eventually. Oh well. Definitely would recommend looking elsewhere for your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: RK98

customer_reviews.title: A mattress worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Decided on this bed and so glad I did. It has stability and the memory foam that gives it the right amount of softness that confirms perfectly to my body for an affordable price. I have spent a bit of money on other mattresses and would repurchase this over any of the others I’ve bought. I would highly recommend this product. I chose a stable bass and skipped a box spring and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HDRider

customer_reviews.title: Was worried at First
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about buying a matress online. Chose this one becasue of the cost and reviews. It delivered one day early. The box was damaged but the matress was intact. I let it expand for 4 days while I waited for my new frame. The bed was more firm than I expected but not bad at all. I bought a 2 inch latex topper and 2 inch memory foam topper on discount. The combonation is unreal and feels like a cloud. The lucid matress provides excellent support and the toppers make the bed just riiiight. I hope it last a while.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Big Guys.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6-3 and 235(not fat). Bed is very stable and comfortable. Much better than my $2k Sealy setup. Firm and giving at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Marco S

customer_reviews.title: This mattress sucks
customer_reviews.text: Products s medium firm just hard as a rock besides that it was damaged had a hole on the side and it's about 6in not wide enough for my California king size bed frame
customer_reviews.author: PHATKAT

customer_reviews.title: Great, but... when does the smell go away?
customer_reviews.text: It has been 2 months. The chemical smell continues to permeate the bedding, pajamas and skin. It's awful. Any ideas on how to get rid of the smell? I thought the sides of the bed would be firmer due to the construction as described. We slide of the sides. Otherwise,it filled out well and we love the firmness of the mattress. I'd happily give it 5 stars if the smell had gone away by now. I have written the manufacturer for suggestions about the acrid/chemical smell that. I will try Febreeze next bedding change. Anyone else have ideas that worked?
customer_reviews.author: Cats33

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is what I wanted, a hybrid mattress that is thick. I like a firm mattress. I like having lots of support and no sagging. This mattress isn’t just firm, it’s hard. It needs a quilted layer on top to make it softer against the skin and joints. It needs more cushion. I bought a 4 inch memory foam and quilted cover combo and now the mattress is what I wanted it to be out of the box. All that said...the mattress seems well built and is very supportive. (PS, my mattress unfolded with the coil side up; make sure that the softer side (white side) ends up on top).
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Replaced our Tempur Pedic
customer_reviews.text: This bed is absolutely perfect it replaced our tempurpedic cloud which is about a $3,000 bed. Almost instant better everything! I'm a 400 lb man and when I say that this bed has support I believe there's no better vote than that. Honestly thinking about buying another one just to store so I can have this when this bed dies. As of right now I wouldn't want to sleep on anything else in the world. The edge support is phenomenal, motion transfer as even better. It doesn't matter if I sleep on my side, back or stomach it just feels f****** awesome. Buy this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Clark

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this LUCID mattress for six months now and my backaches have gotten progressively worse. I bought a mattress topper to soften it, but it has not helped. I've been visiting my chiropractor every two weeks now due to the knots on my shoulder and upper back area. The mattress is extremely uncomfortable and it has not gotten better. I'll be purchasing another mattress soon because I can't stand my chronic pain. Unfortunately, this mattress has caused my chronic pain, I'm not someone that suffers from back pain. This mattress is what's triggered this condition. I hope this helps others considering purchasing this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Way too firm.
customer_reviews.text: When I started looking for a mattress I was very worried about finding the right softness/firmness level. Medium-Firm sounded good. However, I wouldn't call this thing Medium-Firm at all. This thing is HARD. I was hoping that after using it for a while it might soften up a bit, but no dice. I have a mattress topper, but that doesn't really do much. For the price it's a good mattress (high quality) but just understand this thing is F-I-R-M.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Sides are sinking down after just TWO WEEKS :(
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was as expected, quick and sufficient. I absolutely love unrolling and airing up, it's so satisfying lol! But I've had it on the floor for a week until my frame was delivered. Now it's been about 2 weeks now and there is already a "peak" in the middle created from both my side and boyfriends side sinking down. I was expecting that after about 6 months, maybe a year. But this developed AFTER TWO WEEKS. Please keep in mind, we aren't heavy set either. If I would have known this, I wouldn't have ordered this mattress. You might want to pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: A mattress oxymoron - "Soft and Comfy with Support"
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems like the best mattress to satisfy anyone. It's soft enough to fall asleep on without any comforter, but has enough support that you can rest in the proper position all night long. The material itself is wonderful...legitimately you could probably not use sheets and be 100% satisfied with the the feel of this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best mattress I have ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best mattress I have ever slept on. I reccomend opening it where you intend to place it due to it being heavy after opening. My husband and I both have ciatic nerve problems and we have slept like babies since we got this mattress a month ago. You don't sink down into it where you cant move like you would with memory foam. The latex helps it to bounce back and give it a nice firmness, but not too firm. It truly is amazing I highly reccomend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha New

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!!! 😣
customer_reviews.text: I can feel every spring in this mattress. Ugh! I’ve rotated it. I even put an expensive foam mattress topper on it. SPRINGS SPRINGS SPRINGS sticking me everywhere. I’m an average sized human, so I don’t think I should be feeling anything but comfort, which was clearly not the case. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Zingaralala

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I have ever slept on!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is frickin awesome! I have been sleeping on it for about 3 weeks now and have decided it's the best mattress I have ever slept on. I have severe back problems...my dr. wants to do major surgery. I was sleeping on a very expensive pillow top mattress and getting up in severe pain every morning. Since I have switched that has changed. I shopped around and read all the reviews I could find before I decided on this one. I worried the entire time I was waiting for it to arrive and my first couple nights I have to admit I thought I had made a big mistake...but after that it's been awesome! I highly recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: linda from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Price...Quality... Comfort... Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now that we've slept on these Lucid Hybrid mattresses for about 100 days I believe I can review them. First the price point is fantastic...the quality is excellent. Sleeping on them is as good or better than any mattress we've owned... for a lot more money. Chose the hybrid because of the need for a firm feel. Don't want to sink in and can't move easily and sweat all night long. 10" hybrid is the ticket for us. Just enough cush to allow for a very comfortable sleeping experience. We have power adjustable bed frames and work perfectly with that set up. All in all from price to quality to comfort 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N

customer_reviews.title: This Lucid hybrid Mattress is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The Lucid hybrid latex mattress is everything you could want in a big name brand super expensive mattress. Psssst for a fraction of the price Amazing, Thank you, Lucid I’m sleeping like a baby seriously! The mattress is not to firm nor to plush just rite sleeps cool no sinking in the mattress feeling its great for all types of sleep positions back stomach side and even those sleepers that sleep like there doing gymnastics in there sleep. yup you know who are! Give it a try won’t be disappointed!!! Three Cheers for Lucid.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good support for people over 250lbs
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great mattress. I weigh 270lbs, but when I purchased my last mattress I was about 170lbs, so I was very concerned about how well my new mattress would support me. We switched from a Tufted and Needle memory foam mattress. I thought I loved a full memory foam mattress for the comfort, but this latex hybrid is so much better. No aches and pains in the morning, my whole body feels supported, and it's just the right amount of comfort. The best part is the cost of this product, because I do not feel like I'm sleeping on a cheap mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up for long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress when I was pregnant because I needed better support. This mattress provided that but it was too firm for a side sleeper like me, and I had to put a 2” mattress topper on it. It is also hot even though it says it is temp neutral. After three months of sleeping on it, there is a hill in the middle of the bed where me and my husband don’t sleep. I’m glad it was inexpensive because it isn’t worth more than what we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a slab of concrete
customer_reviews.text: Way harder than we expected, to the point where my husband who likes a firm bed usually even thinks it is too hard. It's also incredibly heavy to the point where lifting up the corner to put the fitted sheet on is a strain on my back. My husband and I had a really hard time dragging it up to our room. I will give it one thing though, since it is a hybrid it has a little bit of bounce which is nice, if you know what I mean. Rather than send this back which I have no clue how to accomplish, I'm now ordering a mattress topper to make it tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on air!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my MIL who has a terrible back. She’s had an uncomfortable mattress for well over a year now. Let me tell you, should could not POSSIBLY be happier with this mattress! The first night she slept 12 straight hours! The best night of sleep she’s had in years. Yay! Thanks Lucid!
customer_reviews.author: MyKidsLoveShoes

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I was a bit skeptical about purchasing the hybrid model. However, it turned out to be a good choice. The edges are not that sturdy as other reviewers mentioned but it is sturdy enough and keeps its shape well and I have had no issue with the edges so far. I've used gel+memory form mattresses for a long time due to my back and this one helps me to have a decent sleep and no back pain when I wake up. As some mentioned, it gets a little bit warm though but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Prime

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for foam lovers.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Lucid hybrid and the classic brands decker hybrid 10.5" mattress. I like this bed is firm, rises to the height evenly and the off gassing is very little. It seems like a good quality mattress for now. This mattress is slightly smaller than the bed frame. 2 fingers gap between the mattress and the frame. It feels more like a memory foam mattress instead of a spring mattress, you get more of the sink in feeling, then some deeper support from the spring. The classic brands hybrid feels very different. I would recommend this bed for the price it's a good match.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Firmness decreases rapidly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress in April of 2019. The mattress was nice at first ( not sure if it’s because of the change in mattresses or what). The mattress has progressively gotten softer and softer, to the point of causing my back to hurt again.
customer_reviews.author: drcoop18

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First night felt ok, bit of sink for my preference, but i am a 210lb 6' man, sink is definitely expected. Harder to change positions at night without feeling like climbing out of hole. Will continue to update review if anything changes. 6month review. Same performance, shapes to body contour. Wife loves it, we sleep with AC always, retains body heat, slightly uncomfortable. 18 month review, mattress is GARBAGE. Lousy foam quality showed over time. Sinks more than 4 inches in pressure points, extremely hot and just awful. I regret this purchase. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Latex & spring bounce, not too soft or firm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 5” lucid mattress & it was Way too short. I could feel the box springs under, ugh! Bought this instead, & omg, it’s perfect! Not too hard or soft, perfect height, bouncy unlike memory foam, & the price is amazing. I kept the 5” too for my guest room to make the bed higher! Just don’t buy a metal box spring with a 5”! Anything 5” is kinda disappointing! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our travel trailer. I was a little concerned when it came and we opened it and it was really tall. I have to hop a little to get into bed with this mattress but its well worth it. Have not slept so well in a long time. Its is very, very comfortable. Considering one for my home mattress. These come in 6, 10, and 12 inches.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELL HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Like a rock
customer_reviews.text: I was sleeping fine on a firm conventional mattress before getting this mattress at my wife's suggestion. This mattress is like sleeping on a sand bag. Would've returned it, but once it expands you have a 100 lb. huge slab of "hybrid-ness" that's not leaving your house without some help. I offered it to my son who said if he doesn't like it, he'll at least help me evict it. I should've known better than to buy a bed on line.
customer_reviews.author: William V

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: IF YOU ARE A BAG OF STICKS LIKE ME
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: IF YOU ARE A BAG OF STICKS LIKE ME I would reconsider purchasing this bed. Not going to lie, this bed is good quality and seems very durable. BUT if you are like me & weigh 120 lbs., or anything less than 140 even, it’s going to feel like a slab of concrete to you. You will not sink in at all. My husband is 230 lbs. with a bad back so this is great for him, BUT I’m returning this bed because we both sleep on our old $200 Olee Sleep hybrid mattress much better. Also my bed had inflated with these weird lumps, idk what happened there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty firm
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for medium firm as promoted, but actually ended up being much more firm than expected. Pros: It is a quality mattress. And it does sleep very neutral with no sweaty nights. Cons: It is heavy, very heavy. Have someone else on hand to help you lift and position it. And keep in mind that this mattress is firm with very little sink.
customer_reviews.author: Gryp

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mattress, Packaging? What the heck
customer_reviews.text: Well, I really like the mattress. It was easy to set up and it fits my needs. I brought it inside and it was setup within 24 hours. However, I must say the packaging was a whole other ball game. MY mattress arrived, not in a box/cardboard or anything. It was upright like something you see at a carpet mill, completely engulfed in layers and layers of plastic. The delivery people sat it on my front porch and luckily it wasn't raining, wth????? I'm going to take a guess and during transportation the box or whatever it was SUPPOSED to be in, got completely destroyed. Amazon needs to up their game seriously....
customer_reviews.author: J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived quickly, in good Amazon fashion. I removed the plastic that held the rolled mattress together using the tool provided. It inflated pretty rapidly, and I was able to sleep on it that night. There was very little odor, and I wasn't bothered by it. I've been sleeping on it for a month or so now and am happy with my purchase. It's a good deal on a comfortable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: elgringo

customer_reviews.title: loses support over time
customer_reviews.text: this mattress was ok at first. now closing in on a year i am waking up with back aches. was a little leery about these hybrids and now i can see that this one does not work for me. i will buy another lucid gel foam. i have a twin xl that is great! should have got the queen size one instead of the hybrid but wanted to try it after reading the reviews. hope the new queen gel will be just like the twin xl.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Wondell

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the "Medium Firm, No Sink" description
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is advertised as medium firm with no sink, which I find both statements not to be true. MEDIUM FIRM - Mattress is not firm at all. I weight 200 pounds and sleep solo on this mattress, and I can not feel any firmness at all. I wake up tired and constantly been experiencing back pain. NO SINK - That's simply not true. After some days of usage, which got worse during the first couple of weeks, I can feel that the middle area of the mattress is sinking me when compared to the edges. I will either try to return the product or never even consider this brand again and sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Everton Agner

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a firm bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my son after quite a lot of research. He doesn't like the plush feel of memory foam so I went the this hybrid latex. We unboxed and set it up and it did take a couple days to adjust to it's shape although he slept on it that night...he really likes it but I would say it's on the firm side of the scale so if you want a plush feel this bed probably isn't for you but if you like a firm or moderately firm mattress this bed for the money would be a great choice
customer_reviews.author: Devilgog

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby
customer_reviews.text: I love it i am sleeping through the night, all the way. This is amazing and cozy. I love it. Plus really good for the dance of life, no squeaking springs back, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: zoku

customer_reviews.title: Not as firm as many reviews claim
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I was very nervous due to all of the reviews talking about how firm it is. My husband wanted a bed that was more firm, but in the past I have been more of a right in the middle in terms of firmness preference. This bed, however, is not as firm as I was expecting. It has a lot of bounce, but it does not sink too much when you lie down. I have slept very comfortably on this bed for several nights and we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy without damaging your back and pocket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a firm mattress! But is still soft enough to be cozy. Good support for your back. I'm a stomach sleeper and love this so far. It is just the right amount of bouncy. No sinking feeling. Even though it's got internal springs...A person already in bed isn't disturbed by another getting in. I guess that's credit to the individually pocketed springs. The bed seems to be temperature neutral. But I haven't used this in the summer yet. Will update if it gets too hot. Probably the best you can get for your money in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Shubham Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We've had our king mattress for a few months and love it! It's heavy, so be prepared and ask for help to get it out of the box and set it up. The setup was easy for the most part. We had to do some maneuvering, so make sure to open it where you don't have to flip it or anything. Great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granite slab covered in carpet padding
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of firm beds, but this takes it to the extreme. I had a broken bed before that creaked and groaned with every movement and I am almost as uncomfortable sleeping on this mattress. It feels like I am sleeping on a stack of boards, covered in a thin pad. I wake up every morning with lower back pain, because the mattress has no give whatsoever. Do not make the mistake of buying this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Aytchie Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep we’ve had in years ***** UPDATED 8/30/20********
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought this mattress and after several failed attempts at having it delivered (long story—the important thing is we got it), and I have to say the first week has been terrific. Very comfortable for a couple with two very different body types (I am large, my wife is lean). Whether sleeping on our sides or on our backs, it’s been the best sleep we’ve had at home in years. UPDATE 8/30/20: We're well past 100 days of sleeping on this mattress, and both my wife and I still agree that it was a wise purchase. Very comfortable, great for sleeping on our sides and back. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress in May 2020 and have been sleeping on it ever since. Easy delivery, nicely packaged. We followed instructions and allowed it to open for 2 full days before we slept on it. Very comfortable, medium firm and not hot for sleeping. We are husky, over 50 peeps and love this mattress after sleeping on it for over 4 months. Great mattress at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Midcenturymodgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress with a great warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I got the latex hybrid mattress. It’s a great choice if you like firm mattresses that aren’t bricks. It has just enough give to be comfortable for a side sleeper while still being easy to get out of in the morning. Great warranty, too! Mine came with a 10 year. I know some earlier all-foam Lucid’s came with a 25 year, but 10 is excellent, especially for a fairly inexpensive mattress. As others have noted, it comes rolled up in a box and you unroll it at home. It only took 2 days for the off-gassing smell to fade completely.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: 6 months in and all my pressure points ache
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had the bed 6 months, I'm waking up sore every day. My feet hurt after a good night's sleep. I sleep on my back, and my heels feel like my entire body weight has been resting on them for 8 hours. My shoulders feel the same. If I sleep on my side for a half hour I hurt for an hour at my hips. It's definitely too firm for me now, even after I gave in and ordered a 2" Lucid topper for it. Original review: I've been sleeping on my new mattress for over a week now and I cannot believe I waited so long. So comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gyde

customer_reviews.title: The base is nice but bed uncomfortable and painful
customer_reviews.text: The base is nice and heavy duty. I feel the base is good value. The 12 inch latex bed has been causing both my wife and I neck and back pain. If you ever sleep on your side I highly recommend you get a different matress. I wake up in pain and toss around on this matress all night. The matress is very firm. I will say that the quality of the matress appears to be very good. I recommend getting a matress with a better return policy/ customer service. To summarize matress can cause very bad back pain. I gave 1 star as the primary reason for a matress is comfort and sleeping on the floor is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: CONCRETE
customer_reviews.text: I love a good med/firm mattress and this one stated just that. The quality is awesome, made very well and has nice weight. BUT, its hard as a rock, it actually hurt to lay on it. My ribs were sore from sleeping on my side and my back was killing me from trying all the other positions on this mattress. I purchased the 12" and was hoping for perfection. Not this one, sorry! If you like Rock Hard- Firm, this mattress is for you! I have since given this mattress away hoping someone can sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra martin

customer_reviews.title: Best natural latex hybrid mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Second time I’ve bought from this company over the past 4 years and have been impressed every time. For the price and the fact that it comes in a bag, you would think it’s crap. But to the contrary this thing is amazing! We unrolled and let sit for about a week just to let it air out and fully expand. Smells are not too much and I’m happy to have a mattress with some natural material. This thing is on the former side, but cushy ya the same time. I will be back to buy another. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm but soft all at the same time. Comfort and pressure relief.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait. I threw my self right on it as soon I got on the frame. I have to say it’s firm, but soft, all at the same time. Awesome bed. I haven’t even slept on it yet But I laid on it for five minutes And felt like falling asleep from comfort and pressure relief. Highly recommend. The mattress is uniform in its shape no lumps or defects and mine didn’t smell like anything just smells like a new bed. The cover on it with cool looking pattern is really soft and comfortable. Put a linen fitted bedding sheet you’ll die every night.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: 12" Medium -midpoint for firm and plush
customer_reviews.text: The two mattresses we got as part of our Split King bundle are quite comfortable. My husband prefers his mattress a little more plush and I like mine a little more firm. We are both over 250 lbs. This mattress is comfortable for both of us. The pain relief for our backs is great, however, I find that sleeping on my side with the head raised is not conducive to shoulder pain relief. Putting the bed to flat does not seem to help much. It is the only part of my body that has an issue. Other than that it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for 1 year. Ordered an extra firm and is it ever. Put a mattress topper on it to try to help it have a little softness to it. Took about 9 months before that happened. Now almost 13 months after purchase we already have sink holes. Our last mattress we purchased before this one was a plush top with individual springs and that lasted 6 years before we started getting sink holes. Would not recommend this mattress unless you like to purchase a new mattress every year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I researched for about a month of mattresses on amazon. I found a YouTube video of reviews of the best mattresses on amazon. This one is the number one hybrid mattress according to the video. And I have to agree. I cannot feel my partner leave the bed or get into it. Highly recommend this product. It’s true to its description as it’s a medium firm feel. There’s some give but not much, but the mattress itself is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: We have found the perfect one!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Who knew sleeping on a good mattress would be so life-changing!? Lucid makes a great bed. We are 62 & 50, we both sleep on our sides. My husband has broad shoulders and has had spinal fusion surgery and i am heavier than i should be but we both sleep great on this mattress. It is firm but not like sleeping on a slab. We find it comfortable and cool. The box arrived intact and the packaging was well done. WE LOVE our Lucid mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Long

customer_reviews.title: At a year all is well and love it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, love it. Great deal. We've had this now for just over a year. After about 2 months break in, mattress seems slightly less firm; just right. Initially it felt a little firmer than we wanted. Not sure if this is us getting used to it, or it is slightly less firm now. Have turned it about 4 times in the last year; not noticing any wear issues. Cons: not much support on the edges seems hotter than an innerspring (may just be us aging) wish it was possible to flip it we have the adjustable base... there is the temptation to spend toooo much time in bed.
customer_reviews.author: KindleCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this mattress. I bought for my son and it is very high quality and comfortable. I was shocked at the price because I bought a similar mattress for my daughter at the store for more than double the price. So the mattress has good spring action without being too firm. Very good support yet soft and comfortable. Perfect for a child or a grown up. My husband thought the mattress was better than our own that we paid over 2k for.
customer_reviews.author: Shaolay jiang

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I bought this mattress because my dog (featured in picture) ruined my other mattress by creating a hole in it. It doesn’t come with a strong new “mattress smell.” The smell is there, but it’s not overwhelming! It’s medium-firm support. Very soft. I actually love it! It’s a little bit bouncy considering that it’s memory foam, but that doesn’t bother me. It was delivered vacuum sealed & rolled up. When I opened it up, it inflated to its actual size pretty quickly which was great! Overall, It’s a great product! Ps. Please don’t mind the pink sheet. My bed sheets are still in the wash lol
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am in my sixties, have arthritis and have broken two different joints. My previous bed was the traditional box spring with a high-quality pillow top mattress. I had to buy an additional down topper to cushion my hips, shoulders, etc and was still in pain all night long. Thank heavens for the lucid hybrid. I almost didn't buy an adjustable base because I thought I would hate the "platform" style mattress. The Lucid hybrid is the best of both worlds: soft and cushioning on the top with great support underneath.
customer_reviews.author: KYCATFAN

customer_reviews.title: The BEST inexpensive bed on the market!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 235 lbs and loves a firm mattress. I'm 125 lbs and prefer a softer mattress. We both LOVE this mattress. We ordered the King size for our new bed. Instead of using a box spring we just put a couple of pieces of plywood down to make a lower profile platform bed with our frame. Super comfortable, my back pain is gone, my husband sleeps like a baby and everyone is happy! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Just right for what was needed, was exactly what thought was ordering
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this mattress! He has gotten old enough for a bigger bed than a twin and I didnt have the funds for a good mattress all at once. This one worked out well. We got it on the payment plan. It came quicker than was originally scheduled. Just pulled it out of box, unrolled it and let it settle for a couple of days. There was minimal scent at the very beginning and was gone very quickly that 1st day. Only negative my son mentioned was it is a little firmer than he usually likes. Since that is what this mattress advertises as being, I didn't take any stars off. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Insert Name Here

customer_reviews.title: Only held form for a couple of weeks. Rip-off.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress about 50% of the time for the past 2 months. At first the mattress was great. After about a month the area of the mattress where I sleep the most 'caved in'. It is now too uncomfortable to keep. I am past the 30 day return policy. I feel like I threw $100's in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy. ♡
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. It's 2019 October, I've been sleeping on it since February 2018. I like soft things since I am always in a lot of pain, pain keeps me up at night. This mattress is soft enough but firm. I'm not saying it takes pain away, it doesn't, at least not mine, but compared to other beds and mattresses it is very comfortable and I look forward to snuggle up in it. When I bought it, queen size was 250$. Affordable and very comfy!!!! Came rolled up in a box, it was very heavy, took 2 people to push it to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Can get up so easy with adjustable bed connected very surprised that I could get out of bed without any help. Did not need a step stool to get out of bed . Fantastic purchase my sheets that were purchased earlier when I had the other bed fit just great no problems. Still learning other things about this super bed. Consider purchasing this Adjustable Bed and 10 Inch Mattress. You won't be sorry can't believer how great they work together, SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: dimples

customer_reviews.title: Definitely on the firm side
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a more comfortable medium-firm sleep, but instead this is definitely firm. Forget deep sleep and waking up refreshed, I toss a bit because of pressure points.
customer_reviews.author: C. Skyline

customer_reviews.title: Very firm, not medium firm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed because it says medium firm and my bed was a little too firm. This bed is even more firm than my firm mattress I had before. This thing is VERY firm, I cannot even stand up straight after a couple nights of sleeping on it. I will find a much softer mattress to replace it UPDATE: I have been waiting a week since i repackaged and returned the mattresses with nothing from the company and no way to contact them, no refund yet, nothing. Very disappointed in this whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed. A tad on the firm side, so if you like softer beds it may not be for you. We got the adjustable base and it is great. Doesn’t get any warmer than our sleep number bed did, motion transfer is a thing of the past. No smell out of the box either.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler F

customer_reviews.title: The BEST, period!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mattress! It is so comfortable and supportive! I wish i could spend all day on it! In fact I’ve found time for a mid day nap now! It is very heavy, so get it in place on base to inflate. Make sure it’s correct with Lucid lettering at the bottom. I had to turn it by myself to make it correct and it’s a BEAR to turn and move! I’ve wanted one of these since we bought one for our daughter a couple years ago and she raved about it! Of course, she was 100% correct!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Much Firmer Than expected; I’m in Pain.
customer_reviews.text: My backs hurts all the time now. I don’t sleep well at all. I’m groggy in the mornings and I’m writing this review after one week of sleeping on it. I’m a back and side sleeper. Don’t kid yourself, i’s firm. The latex is way too rubbery feeling. Side support is not good. Overall I am going to try and return it. Probably spend more on shipping than what I bought it for. Nice things about it, no offgassing.
customer_reviews.author: elbows and bebowes

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Queen 12" hybrid latex... had for 1 week. Feels like you dropped a thick yoga mat on the floor and laid down for bed. If that's for you, great. My hubby likes it so I'm content to adjust to it. If your climbing around it does give more under localized pressure, like a knee. Good edge support too if you sit on the edge to put on shoes you dont feel like your falling off. I didn't want the memory foam stuck in the mud feeling and I can confirm it doesnt leave you feeling stuck. I cannot believe they make a more firm bed than this.
customer_reviews.author: DSmall

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Cozy As well as Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Took 3-5 weeks for my body to fully adjust. Also, not to sure if it was the mattress or myself but after this break in period, it was a bit less firm. The first 2 weeks I thought the mattress was extremely firm and not very comfortable but around week 3 i was starting to adjust. I’ve had it for about 2 months and it’s well worth the money. Hoping the quality will remain intact for many years to come but very happy with purchase vs spending 3 times the amount for a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up.
customer_reviews.text: Been 18 months since I purchased and have to say I went from completely satisfied to disappointed. Held up great for about 14 months, but after that? No... I can feel pressure on my back from coils. Rotated and helped a bit, but failed a few weeks later. Just bought a My Pillow topper, but not much help. Nothing beats my old Sealy spring mattress that many said I was crazy for spending so much on in 2001. Can't put a price on a good nights sleep. Time to shop around. BTW I'm 200lbs, 6'0.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Again, you get what you pay for. It’s great for kids, not sure how it would hold up for adult sleeper. It’s a second mattress that I purchased, I got one a year prior for my older kid and it’s holding pretty well. Worth the money, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a traditional mattress that was already starting to snag in the middle after only 6 months of use. This mattress is on a slatted base over a captains bed. It's very comfortable and the mattress cover is nice and soft. There was no odd smell when opening and it took a few hours to puff up fully. Its early to say how long it will hold up but I've been sleeping on it for 2 months and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alesha M. Desharnais

customer_reviews.title: Better than a CASPER!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this mattress I slept on a Casper Original, I brought my first year of college(4 years ago). The Casper at times was too firm and as someone with fibromyalgia and a side sleeper, a soft supportive mattress is important. The LUCID is a perfect mattress! Very soft, but supportive and not hot! The mattress is heavy though so if you're getting a queen or bigger two people are needed to move it. I'm so happy with the purchase and I actually get good sleep now and wake up refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Ann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: At first this mattress was awesome. I was like how could something so cheap be so great. Now a year and a half later I can not even sleep on the thing. Definitely not built for longevity. Gives me horrible back and hip pain. If you only need a mattress for a year. This will be it
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Finally...A Good Night’s Sleep
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been complaining about the mattress for years. We have tried so many other options and I was reluctant to make this purchase. Now I am very happy to say that he is sleeping and waking up with no pain. Along with the Lucid mechanical bed this has turned out to best one of the best decision/purchases that we have made in a long time. The mattress is well made and offers support as well as comfort for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: RWK

customer_reviews.title: If you want firm this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely is on the firmer side. Not sure why people are saying they sunk in. My husband is a little taller than average and 160lbs and he loves the firmness. He said it’s just the right amount of softness. I prefer more plush and think it’s like sleeping on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Update-Loses firmness-like sinking in quicksand
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress since August 2018. Loved it-for the first 6+ months. Now, it's like trying to scramble out of quicksand. You get what you pay for. NOT for longevity for an older person, or one over 200 lbs. Ditch the quick fix foam mattress craze. They're crap. Back to box springs who have a 10 year warranty FOR A REASON.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: High Tech Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two (diff) XL Twin mattress for a California King platform bed. They are shipped vacuum sealed in a compact package. Watching them expand was a trip. Follow the instructions for the best results...allow 48 for full expansion. I love both mattresses from this manufacturer. They are firm, comfy, cool and a dream to sleep on. Be prepared to rotate them each time that you change sheets; in order to comply with manufacturer suggested maintenance. I was in an auto accident; resulting in intolerable neck and back pain. These mattresses are helping to facilitate my recovery...Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TeriFLA

customer_reviews.title: Good support without being too hard or too soft.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress. Probably the best we have ever owned. It is very heavy. When I cut the plastic holding the mattress in its rolled shape, it opened upside down. I should have had someone help me flip it, because I barely got it turned over. It expanded to its full height within a day or two. It is comfortable without being too soft. My only complaint would be that the edge is not firm enough for sitting on the edge. I’m a big guy, so that is probably why! For sleeping though, the mattress supports well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is subsequently less than amazing. It feels JUST like my super old memory foam topper that I got rid of to get a NEW bed. The bed feels soft and nice once you're getting in but turns into a rock when you sleep. I am an easy sleeper but find myself rather sleeping on the couch than this awful thing. I cant believe it was $300 for THIS. so disappointed !! do NOT fall for the good reviews, not worth the money or time :(
customer_reviews.author: Bee223

customer_reviews.title: Beats the best at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guest bed over more "popular" and more expensive mattresses because I had a hunch their design was superior... and I was not wrong. I've slept on it, two sets of guests have slept on it multiple nights, and everyone loves it. Not too soft, not too firm, no memory foam locking you in position, not too hot, not too bouncy. It's just a really comfortable mattress and for this price to get this quality - shut up and give them your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm for memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. I am a big guy, 6'4" 250lbs. I was nervous about buying this mattress because I usually sink right into memory foam and it is very uncomfortable. With this mattress, there is very little sink, just enough to be comfortable. The mattress arrived very quickly and was easy open. There was a slight chemical smell but it dissipated rather quickly. This mattress is a great value and I recemmend it to anyone looking for a firmer memory foam matress.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Nederhoed

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We just recently downsized to a smaller mattress and decided to try this one. Oh I wish we bought it sooner all these years of back aches gone within 2 days!! I never realized how my mattress was taking a toll on my health! Anyway it’s not to hard not to soft , also while doing “ extra tossing” I realized it doesn’t move around much to cause my bed frame to be noisy! This is a must !!
customer_reviews.author: Lera

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, but not to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed a while ago because it was on sale in preparation for a new bedrooms set, I've had it sitting a while than I finally opened it up, the bed is just as comfortable as I thought but isnt the 12 inches advertised, more like 11 closer to 10, also the corners haven't fully expanded or something because they are lower in spots Edit: the corners have expanded, still isnt 12 inches
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product Find!
customer_reviews.text: I can't answer or rate the pain relief, or sleep quality questions because my lumbar is so bad. So it's not the bed. It was super easy to put together. I had to have help because the base & mattresses were bulky & heavy for one. It works the USB works the adjustable bedworks and I like having the option of flat and adjustable. The cost was perfect for me everything is good so far I've had it for over 8 weeks I believe.
customer_reviews.author: TDWM

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattess, we bought a 10 memory from and a Leesa mattess which where both awful... you just sunk in a hole and had to roll out to change positions. I did reviews before we bought this on and combination of the coils and latex keeps all of the support, but still has the softness for side sleepers.... the only thing I would do different is I would have gotten the 12 inch mattess just for the extra support and height.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea and Brina

customer_reviews.title: What you should know after having this mattress a year.
customer_reviews.text: It's Okay. It is pretty firm and doesn't have much plush to soften. At first the bed feels like it has a lot of support but ends up just being really firm. There are already permanent imprints where my wife and I sleep regardless of rotating the mattress or not. I figured the mattress would get softer over time and never did. This bed took time to get comfortable in and found myself having to sleep in different positions in order to get completely comfortable. Definitely a stomach/back bed as my legs would go to sleep if I tried to sleep on my side.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rinne

customer_reviews.title: It really does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress when I got my adjustable bed. I got the 10 inch as recommended. It took a while to get adjusted to the mattress for sleeping and then all of a sudden all the back and leg pain went away. I was sleeping through the night. It was not hard to rotate mattress every few weeks. I have already recommended this bed and mattress to friends. Just so you know there is a learning curve to sleeping on a latex mattress. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress for under $500.00 there are better mattresses but you will need to spend twice as much. The latex hybrid is great for cushioned support- a bit of sinking into the bed but not too much and you can feel the firmness of the coils giving comfortable support. Sleeps temperature neutral and motion transfer is minimal. The only negative I have found is the side support could be a little better but its not horrible. Little to no odor.
customer_reviews.author: iscottius

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I did not like this mattress at first. But after using it for a while and getting a better pillow I started sleeping great on it. It's a little more on the firm side, which took me time to adjust to, being a side sleeper, but now I wake up rested and no back pain at all! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: NK LOGG

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My sleep number bed was getting a bit hard to stand. It was going on 10 years and my back was starting to notice. I, like other shoppers, researched and searched for a nice supportive, quality bed with a good price. Found it! After only 1 night I am so glad I made this decision. The bed unboxed is very heavy - get some help setting it on a flat surface. After it inflates it’s easy to maneuver on the frame. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Constant Customer

product_meta.title: LUCID 12 Inch Queen Latex Hybrid Mattress - Memory Foam - Responsive Latex Layer - Premium Steel Coils - Medium Firm Feel - Temperature Neutral
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:12 inch| Design:MattressSleep cooler and enjoy greater pressure relief with our new LUCID 10-Inch Latex Hybrid mattress. By combining supportive coils, plush memory foam, and responsive latex, we’ve compiled all the best materials to form the luxury sleep dream team. The perfect mattress for those who are hesitant to purchase a 100-percent memory foam mattress. This medium-firm mattress is supported by a 5.5-inch, individually-encased steel coil base sandwiched in foam for greater edge support and motion isolation, so you and your partner can sleep without interruption all night long. Topped with a two-tone, circular knit fabric cover, this durable mattress is protected by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects and will be part of the family for years to come.
feature_bullets: 6.5-inch, high-quality steel coils are individually-wrapped to increase airflow, isolate motion, and conform to individual sleep styles
Plush memory foam layer is topped with natural latex for the perfect combination of sink and spring
Perfect mattress for those who want the comfort of memory foam with the hypoallergenic and breathable properties of latex
Attractive, two-tone cover finishes the elegant look of this mattress; backed by a 10-year warranty against manufacturer defects
Compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box for simple setup; easily fits through narrow hallways and staircases
100 NIGHT RISK-FREE TRIAL: IF YOU ARE UNSATISFIED WITH THIS MATTRESS, YOU ARE ELIGIBLE FOR A FULL REFUND UP TO 100 DAYS FROM DATE OF RECEIPT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,742 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defect.
